You have eliminated a herd of #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that were pestering the people.

I was taking a walk one evening. The cool breeze and balmy weather brushing past my face...it was the perfect weather for leisurely reading. So, I put a blanket down on the grass and was about to get comfortable.
But suddenly, I heard an underground ringing I hadn't ever heard before.\n\nAre you listening to my story?

Haha! Thank you for offering your help.\nI should finish my story first. So, the underground ringing was accompanied by a herd of #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k. Thanks to my quick reflexes, I was able to avoid them, but those pigs had stomped all over my blanket and book, and even ruined the lunch I had packed.
They're such violent creatures that they're harming other townspeople as well.\n\nCould you, capable adventurer, eliminate 40 #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k for the townspeople?
Are you not interested in what I have to say?
Thanks to you, the #rRibbon Pig#k population has decreased.
